title: Cryptographically-secure pseudorandom number generator
summary: A cryptographically secure pseudorandom number generator (CSPRNG) or cryptographic pseudorandom number generator (CPRNG)[1] is a pseudorandom number generator (PRNG) with properties that make it suitable for use in cryptography. It is also loosely known as a cryptographic random number generator (CRNG) (see Random number generation ยง "True" vs. pseudo-random numbers).[2][3]
